title: City and Transportation 1
sentences: Where is the nearest bus stop?
The bus runs every ten minutes.
I need a ticket for the subway.
What is the best way for me to get to the station?
The street is very busy today.
We are taking the tram to the market square.
The museum is located in the city center.
Überqueren Sie bitte die Straße an der
Please cross the street at the traffic light.
Der Zug hat leider eine halbe Stunde
The train is unfortunately half an hour late.
Wo kann ich hier ein Auto
Where can I rent a car here?
I prefer to go into town on foot today.
Please drive straight ahead until the next intersection.
The taxi is already waiting in front of the hotel.
Where is the nearest gas station?
In der Stadt gibt es viele
There are many sights in the city.
Der Parkplatz vor dem Haus ist leider
The parking lot in front of the house is unfortunately full.
I'm getting off at the next station.
The bicycle is a practical means of transport.
Where can I find the timetable for this bus?
Wir müssen an der nächsten Haltestelle
We have to change at the next stop.
The highway is closed because of an accident.
Parking is very expensive in the city center.
The airport is far away from here.
How long does the trip with the subway take?
dictionary:
die Bushaltestelle - bus stop
fahren - to drive / travel
der Fahrschein - ticket
kommen - to come / get to
belebt - busy / lively
die Straßenbahn - tram
das Stadtzentrum - city center
die Ampel - traffic light
die Verspätung - delay
mieten - to rent
der Fuß - foot
geradeaus - straight ahead
das Taxi - taxi
die Tankstelle - gas station
die Sehenswürdigkeit (Pl. Sehenswürdigkeiten) - sight / tourist attraction
voll - full
aussteigen - to get off / exit (a vehicle)
die Ecke - corner
das Verkehrsmittel - means of transport
der Fahrplan - timetable / schedule
umsteigen - to change (trains/buses)
die Autobahn - highway / motorway
die Stadtmitte - city center / downtown
der Flughafen - airport
die Fahrt - trip / journey
